title: Calories in One Rice Crispy Square
meta_description: Discover calories in rice crispy square, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per treat with easy tweaks.
h1: Calories in One Rice Crispy Square
assumptions: Standard homemade Rice Krispies treat square (~22 g each), made with puffed rice cereal, marshmallows, and butter; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, brand of ingredients, size, and preparation method. Check labels for commercial versions.

quick_answer.text: One rice crispy square has about 90 kcal, mostly from carbs and a bit of fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp chocolate topping per square
Use margarine instead of butter per square

faqs.q: How many calories in one rice crispy square?
faqs.a: Approximately 90 kcal for a standard 22 g square.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a rice crispy square?
faqs.a: About 17 g total carbs, including 8 g sugars and minimal fiber.

faqs.q: Is a rice crispy square high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 8 g sugars per square from marshmallows.

faqs.q: How much fat in rice crispy treats?
faqs.a: Roughly 2.3 g fat per square, with 1.4 g saturated.

faqs.q: Do rice crispy squares have protein?
faqs.a: Very little, about 0.7 g per square from the rice cereal.
